constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 82 (Friday, May 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PHILLIPS:
H.R. 7770.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H4971]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Life Saving Leave Act
